name: Cupimon
description: Kyupimon is a bipedal creature covered in white fur. It has yellow eyes, fangs, stubby arms with three red claws each, stubby legs, three toes on each foot, and yellow wings. Its general body shape, the horn-like appendage on the top of its head and the swirl at the base of the appendage make Kyupimon resemble Chestnut Angel from Tamagotchi .
